metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18829 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: There exists a NULL pointer dereference in ff_vc1_parse_frame_header_adv in vc1.c in Libav 12.3, which allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service through a crafted aac file.

notes.Note: ebarretto> No fix available as of 2019-03-01

criterions.comment: gst-libav1.0 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
vlc package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
